text: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبَ عَنۡ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلرَّوۡعُ وَجَآءَتۡهُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ يُجَٰدِلُنَا فِي قَوۡمِ لُوطٍ

translation.en: And when the fright had left Abraham and the good tidings had reached him, he began to argue with Us concerning the people of Lot
translation.id: Maka ketika rasa takut hilang dari Ibrahim dan kabar gembira telah datang kepadanya, dia pun bersoal jawab dengan (para malaikat) Kami tentang kaum Luṭ
